steps.name: User is on TekSchool page
User Click on Test Environment link
User should see Test Environment page
User click on a product category on the blue bar menu we can use the link: - Show All Desktop -
User click on: - Add to cart -, beneath the picture of the '1' th product in the list

steps.name: User should see a message 'Success: You have added'
Users click on a product category on the blue bar menu we can use the link :  - Show All Desktop -
User click on a product s picture of the '1' th product in the list
User should see a product detailed list with a blue button : - Add to cart - on the right side
User click on the blue button : Add to cart
User should see a message 'Success: You have added'

User Click on Test Environment link
